subject: Nutrition
title: The Liver's Secret Role
description: Learn The Liver's Secret Role in one minute.

hook.text: Your liver processes every nutrient from every meal before it reaches the rest of your body.

buildup.text: Blood from the intestines flows directly to the liver via the portal vein for inspection and processing.

discovery.text: The liver detoxifies harmful substances, stores vitamins, and converts nutrients into usable forms.

twist.text: The liver can regenerate from as little as 25% of its tissueâ€”the only internal organ that can do this.

climax.text: Without your liver filtering first, nutrients and toxins would flood your bloodstream unchecked.

punchline.text: Every bite is inspected by your liver first.

quiz.question: What unique ability does the liver have?
options: It can regenerate from 25% of its tissue
